Text: Thank you for your sharing... nice guy

Anyone knows when we can expect the 5001 pack?  And did anyone ever figure out what happened to Farnorth, the person who did the majority of the NDS Rom postings prior to Emuparadise? (Thanks again Emuparadise btw!)

Thanks to both Joda and Farnorth for doing these, and now thanks to emuparadise.

And yes, I also would like to know when the next release will be.

Many thanks for what you have done so far.

Awesome, man. I don't really have time to pick each and every single release by hand, and was desesperately looking for packs now that Farnorth is gone.

You frickin' kick ass!
